title: The Power of Purpose and Positivity
description:
Sadie welcomes Chrissy Metz, who plays Kate Pearson on the NBC drama This Is Us, to the podcast. They discuss her struggle to make it in Hollywood as an actress, why it is important to believe in other people until they are able to do it for themselves, and her new movie, Breakthrough, which releases on Easter 2019.

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
